price: Фиръавндан. Дарҳақиқат, у каттазанг ва тажовузкорлардан эди.
arabic: مِن فِرۡعَوۡنَۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَالِيٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمُسۡرِفِينَ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: min fir'ʿawna innahu kāna ʿāliyan mina al-mus'rifīna
